item_name: Danimals Smoothie, Strawberry Explosion, Wild Watermelon
item_description: Strawberry Explosion, Wild Watermelon, Value Pack
nf_ingredient_statement: Strawberry Explosion Flavored: Cultured Grade A Low Fat Milk, Water, Sugar, Contains Less than 1% of Modified Corn Starch, Whey Mineral Complex, Natural Flavor, Pectin, Vegetable Juice (for Color), Malic Acid, Potassium Sorbate (to Maintain Freshness), Vitamin D3, Sodium Citrate, Agar Agar. Wild Watermelon Flavored: Cultured Grade A Low Fat Milk, Water, Sugar, Contains Less than 1% of Modified Corn Starch, Natural Flavor, Whey Mineral Complex, Pectin, Agar Agar, Beta Carotene (for Color), Malic Acid, Potassium Sorbate (to Maintain Freshness), Vitamin D3, Sodium Citrate.
